main.name: Marina Torres
main.description: From Brazil and based in London, I have over five years of experience in journalism and content production on the beats of economics, politics, sustainability, and entertainment.
main.bio: I’m Marina, a journalist with over five years of experience in covering economics, politics, sustainability, and entertainment. My work has been featured in Poder360, beanz magazine, Correio Braziliense, Jornal de Brasília, Downstage, and O Estado de S. Paulo. In my free time, I volunteer for educational and environmental causes, helping non-profits achieve their goals. Check out my portfolio at: https://marinatorres.journoportfolio.com
main.contactmessage: Feel free to reach out to me for collaboration or consultation.
